id: {Player} rejects the offer to join the {Capital1} Academy

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} refuses the offer to join the academy, which comes at a surprise to {Knight1}. In order to prevent him from being turned into a lab experiment, she smuggles him out of {Site1} and tells him to run away, and to never look back. {Player}, confused but not knowing who else to trust, follows her instructions and ends up in the hands of the Thieves’ Guild, an association of criminals operating within outer {Capital1}. Seeing his potential, the guild’s leaders recruited him quickly and put him to use. {Player} would spend the next few years stealing from both commonfolk and nobility, sheltered and hidden away from the public eye by the guild.

{Player} and {Knight1} would meet once again during the early years of the {Kingdom#Adjective} Crusades, a series of long and bloody wars fought by the kingdom of {Kingdom#Name} against its opponents. He was tasked with retrieving artifacts left behind by the people who were fleeing the {Kingdom#Adjective} army. {Knight1} catches him in the middle of the act, resulting in a chase. During this chase, she was ambushed by remnants of the enemy nation’s army, suffering a wound to her leg and falling to the ground.
